lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Mrs. Bush Cites Women's Plight Under Taliban'' (news article, Nov. 18): If Laura Bush is truly interested in addressing the plight of women, she ought not just fixate on their treatment by the Taliban, but should also focus on how women are treated in Saudi Arabia. It is high time that the American government recognize that Saudi Arabia is not our ally and that it does not conform to civilized standards of treatment for women.
